law.catch_line: KRS 286.3-850 to 286.3-884 is exclusive procedure for appointment of receiver or liquidating agent.
law.text: KRS 286.3-850 to 286.3-884 provides the exclusive procedure for the appointment of a receiver or other liquidating agent of a bank under the laws of this state.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 324, sec. 57, effective July 13, 1984.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). In accordance with 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247, secs. 38 and 39, this statute has been renumbered as a section of the Kentucky Financial Services Code, KRS Chapter 286, and KRS references within this statute have been adjusted to conform with the 2006 renumbering of that code.
